name: Haunted House (itch) (Ahmet Kamil Keleş)
description:
Your house is haunted! But they haunted the wrong house. Your mission is to destroy the heinous ghosts, as the ghost slayer.

This game is designed for mobiles, but it can still be played in computers if you don't mind the portrait mode. It's also playable for Androids.

You control the ghost hunter by sliding your finger, it applies force to him. You destroy the ghosts by running over them. But be careful, your swipes are limited!

Features

  •  Endless gameplay: Random level generation
  •  5 different enemies
  •  24 different backgrounds (color variations of 3 backgrounds)
  • 6  player skins
